C

Character - Class in <Unnamed>
A simple character class for every character in the over world levels.
Character(World, Shape, BodyImage) - Constructor for class Character
 
CharacterBattle - Class in <Unnamed>
A class for the statistics of every character, enemies and the player's stats is in another class but is an extension of this class.
CharacterBattle(int, int, Shape, BodyImage) - Constructor for class CharacterBattle
 
CharacterBattle(int, int, Shape, BodyImage, int, int) - Constructor for class CharacterBattle
 
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BattleRules
This allows the enemy to damage the player by making contact with them
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BattleStart
This method runs every time an enemy in the over world has collides with another body This allows the player to enter the battle world with the enemy when they collide with them
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BulletRules
This method is called every time a bullet from the player collides with another body This allows the bullet to remove health from the enemy with the player's attack power.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class EnemyAttackRules
This method runs every time an enemy's knife weapon collides with another body This allows the knife to damage the player and remove health with the enemy's attack stat.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class ExitListener
This method is executed every time a body collides with the exit of the stage This allows the player to move on to the next stage when allowed to The player must first "complete" the level before moving onto the next level.
ControllerBattle - Class in <Unnamed>
The controls for the player in the battle world.

ControllerOverWorld - Class in <Unnamed>
The controls for the player in the over world levels.
ControllerOverWorld(Walker) - Constructor for class ControllerOverWorld
 
ControlPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is for the GUI at the bottom of the screen.
ControlPanel(Game) - Constructor for class ControlPanel
